summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TourAgent tourism website. All major functionality working correctly including homepage, services page, navigation, booking form, auth modal, and all interactive elements.

design_issues.issue: Language switching content may not reflect immediately
Dark mode toggle may need refinement in visual feedback
Some dropdown interactions require force clicks due to overlay elements

passed_tests: Homepage loads with correct title and hero section
Header components: logo, language selector, services link, help dropdown, account dropdown
Hero section booking form: all 5 tabs (flight, hotel, bus, car, transfer) functional
Trip type radio buttons work (one way, round trip, multi-city)
Booking form fields are interactive and functional
Flight deals section displays correctly with discount cards
Popular destinations section shows cities with pricing
Featured hotels section displays hotel cards with ratings
Footer displays with correct branding and copyright
Services page content: hero stats, service cards, why choose us section
Navigation between home and services pages works both ways
Auth modal opens from account dropdown
Auth modal shows proper form fields and social login options
Auth modal can be closed properly
Language selector dropdown shows TR/EN/AZ options
